title: The Making of 'Sunday'
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Edwin Scragg and Scope Films
brief_description: The process of making a feature film, in this case, the South Australian Film Corporation’s award-winning first feature film “Sunday Too Far Away”, is the subject of this film. The problems and joys of film-making are revealed through interviews with director Ken Hannan and star Jack Thompson. The staging of a car crash is among the aspects of film-making included in this film.
